slides.title: Welcome to GST Registration
slides.content:
# GST Registration

Registration is the **gateway to GST compliance**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Thresholds** - Registration limits
- **Process** - Application procedure
- **GSTIN** - Structure and meaning
- **Amendments** - Changes and cancellation

## Topics

| Area | Focus |
|------|-------|
| Compulsory | Mandatory cases |
| Voluntary | Optional |
| Process | Application |
| Cancellation | Termination |

slides.title: Registration Thresholds
slides.content:
# Aggregate Turnover

## Limits

| Category | Threshold |
|----------|----------|
| Services | Rs 20 lakh |
| Goods (normal) | Rs 40 lakh |
| Special states | Rs 10/20 lakh |

## Aggregate Turnover

```
Includes:
- Taxable supplies
- Exempt supplies
- Exports
- Interstate supplies

Excludes:
- Inward supplies under RCM
- CGST, SGST, IGST
```

slides.title: Compulsory Registration
slides.content:
# Mandatory Cases

## Section 24

| Category | Threshold |
|----------|----------|
| Interstate supply | Nil |
| Casual taxable | Nil |
| Non-resident | Nil |
| Reverse charge | Nil |
| E-commerce operator | Nil |
| E-commerce seller | Nil |
| TDS/TCS | Nil |
| Input service distributor | Nil |

## No Threshold Applies

```
These persons must register
regardless of turnover
```

slides.title: GSTIN Structure
slides.content:
# Registration Number

## 15-Digit Format

```
Position | Meaning
---------|--------
1-2      | State code
3-12     | PAN
13       | Entity number
14       | Z (default)
15       | Check digit
```

## Example

```
27AABCU9603R1ZM

27 = Maharashtra
AABCU9603R = PAN
1 = Entity
Z = Default
M = Check digit
```

slides.title: Registration Process
slides.content:
# Application Procedure

## Online Process

```
1. Visit GST portal
2. Fill Part A (PAN, email, mobile)
3. OTP verification
4. TRN generated
5. Fill Part B (business details)
6. Upload documents
7. Submit with DSC/EVC
```

## Timeline

| Stage | Time |
|-------|------|
| Verification | 3 working days |
| Query response | 7 working days |
| Approval | Within 7 days |

## Documents Required

- PAN, Aadhaar
- Business address proof
- Bank details
- Photographs

slides.title: Composition Scheme
slides.content:
# Small Taxpayer Option

## Eligibility

| Type | Limit |
|------|-------|
| Goods | Rs 1.5 crore |
| Services (special) | Rs 50 lakh |

## Tax Rates

| Category | Rate |
|----------|------|
| Manufacturers | 1% |
| Traders | 1% |
| Restaurants | 5% |
| Services | 6% |

## Restrictions

- No interstate supply
- No ITC claim
- Cannot collect GST

slides.title: Casual and Non-Resident
slides.content:
# Special Categories

## Casual Taxable Person

```
Occasionally supplies in a state
where no fixed place of business

Advance tax deposit required
Registration valid for 90 days
```

## Non-Resident Taxable Person

```
No fixed establishment in India
Supplies to persons in India

Advance tax deposit required
Registration valid for 90 days
```

slides.title: Input Service Distributor
slides.content:
# ISD Registration

## Definition

```
Office that:
- Receives tax invoices
- For input services
- Distributes credit to branches
```

## Distribution Rules

| Rule | Application |
|------|-------------|
| Pro-rata | Based on turnover |
| Specific | If attributable |

## Restrictions

- Only distributes credit
- Cannot claim additional ITC
- Must issue ISD invoice

slides.title: Amendment of Registration
slides.content:
# Changes to Registration

## Core Fields

| Field | Approval Required |
|-------|------------------|
| Legal name | Yes |
| Principal place | Yes |
| Additional place | Yes |
| Stakeholders | Yes |

## Non-Core Fields

| Field | Auto-approval |
|-------|---------------|
| Bank details | Yes (15 days) |
| Email/Mobile | Yes |
| Goods/Services | Yes |

## Timeline

- Within 15 days of change
- Approval within 15 days

slides.title: Amendment Quiz
slides.quizQuestion: Change in principal place of business requires?

slides.title: Cancellation of Registration
slides.content:
# Termination

## Suo Motu (By Officer)

| Ground | Action |
|--------|--------|
| Non-filing | 6 consecutive months |
| Violation | Law breach |
| Composition abuse | Scheme violation |
| No business | 6 months |

## Voluntary

```
Application in REG-16
Within 30 days of business closure
```

## Consequences

- ITC reversal on stock
- Final return required
- Pending dues payment

slides.title: Revocation of Cancellation
slides.content:
# Restoration

## Process

```
1. Apply within 30 days
2. File pending returns
3. Pay all dues
4. Application in REG-21
```

## Extension

| Authority | Extension |
|-----------|----------|
| Officer | 30 days |
| Commissioner | Further 30 days |

## Rejection

- Fresh registration required
- New GSTIN issued

slides.title: Multiple Registrations
slides.content:
# Distinct Persons

## Separate Registrations

| Scenario | Requirement |
|----------|-------------|
| Different states | Mandatory |
| Same state, different verticals | Optional |
| SEZ unit | Mandatory |

## Implications

```
Each registration is distinct person
Supply between them is taxable
```

## Centralized Registration

- Not available under GST
- State-wise registration required
